statements: DELETE FROM peer_review_data WHERE review_id = 101 AND completion_status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM peer_review_data WHERE reviewer_username = 'Alice' AND completed_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM peer_reviews WHERE review_score < 5 AND review_completion_date < '2023-01-01'
DELETE FROM reviewers WHERE expertise = 'Software Engineering' AND reviews_completed > 10
DELETE FROM PeerReviewCompletionRates WHERE completion_rate < 0.5 AND reviewer_id = 1;
DELETE FROM CustomizableReports WHERE report_id = 10 AND report_description IS NULL;
DELETE FROM peer_reviews WHERE reviewer_id = 2 AND reviewee_id = 3;
